about_the_game:
heyy, Grace here. So, you want to know about Lacey’s games? Ok, But just so you know, I have nothing to do with what people have been saying out there.

Lacey’s Flash Games are the real girl games - or at least, that’s how they were marketed back in the day. Most of them are simple and intuitive point and click games. You interact with the environments, make choices, and unlock different endings depending on what you do. Sounds harmless, right?

  • Interactive exploration: on the website, each game places you in a themed environment, whether it's a petshop, a skate park, or a makeup parlour. Your role is to follow the instructions and make decisions

  • Cute and vibrant art, but... the colorful and friendly style might fool you. Look closer, and you might notice something is a little... off

  • Multiple endings: some endings are predictable, others not so much... Even I have no idea about everything Rocio hid in these games

  • Charming characters: Lacey and the Jammers are very cute, but certain interactions might leave you with a strange feeling. If something feels out of place, maybe it’s best to just ignore it

Well that's basically the gist of it, or at least of what I remember, there might be some stuff that Rocio added without me knowing but, oh well, if you REALLY want to find them, then be my guest on this reflection of her twisted mind.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and insinuations of murder. Blood, corpses and dismemberment are also present.

name: Lacey's Flash Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: These are the REAL girls’ games. In the mid 2000s, Charlie (Charchar887), discovers the Laceys's Flash Games and their disturbing secrets. Step into the virtual world to uncover the whereabouts of the missing website creator, Rocio Yani, and explore all the games and activities with Lacey!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
